wheel.description: A basic steering wheel. You can use it to control the ship when placed on it.

light.description: Let there be light! Its range can be extended by the Generator.

printer.description: Use printer to upgrade your Tech Tree, unlock more blueprints for your ship.

crafter.description: Use basic crafter to craft more machines (like what you're doing right now).

crafter advanced.description: Use advanced crafter to craft crazy machines.

turret.description: A powerful weapon. You can use it portably or placed on the ground.

drill.description: A katana type lazer. Powerful melee weapon. Swing it to deal damage, the faster you swing the more powerful it is. Can deflect bullets.

healer.description: A healing beam. You can use it to heal or fix structures.

generator.description: Provides additional powers to machines. Can boost their functions.

recycler.description: Recycle random resources and turn them into useful ones.

decomposer.description: A portable recycler, vaccum in resouces and recycle them.

box.description: Resource vaccum. Use this to store and stack resources.

auto wheel.description: Hey isn't this a alien technologies?? :/

reducer.description: A sheild, Slow down any projectile inside zone.

relay.description: Activates all the machines in the zone.

reality manipulator.description: Change the movement of the star.

radar.description: Scan the nearby enviorments and provide useful directions. Place it near a Compass to update directions.

packager.description: Useful machine for packaging nanos into bundles.

turret speed buffer.description: Buff projectile speed of nearby turrets.

turret damage buffer.description: Buff projectile damage of nearby turrets.

turret rate buffer.description: Buff turret cooldown of nearby turrets.

base.description: A weapon base for connecting weapon to the ship. Weapon placed on it can be controlled by mouse.

base fixed.description: A fixed weapon base for connecting weapon to the ship. Weapon placed on it can be controlled by mouse, but the rotation is limited.

power.description: Provides extra cool down recharge rate to all weapon bases on the ship. Must be connected to a Generator to work.

booster.description: Provides extra speed the ship. Must be connected to a Generator to work.

room2.description: [TEST]The special all-round room for testing purpose.

room3.description: The Vanguard model room. Comes With a main turret base and two small turret base.

room4.description: The Striker model room. Comes With a main axied turret base and a power utility slot.

room5.description: The Cargo model room. With plenty of space and two utility slot.

roomUtility.description: The Utility model room. With basic defense turret base and a utility slot.

wall upgrade.description: Upgrade a wall to the armoured wall.

hardpoint.description: A hard point that can be placed on ships. Allows you to operate the machine built on it with LEFT CLICK while driving the ship.

hardpoint(Right Click).description: A hard point that can be placed on ships. Allows you to operate the machine built on it with RIGHT CLICK while driving the ship.
